text: Lauro António (18 August 1942 – 3 February 2022) was a Portuguese movie director, producer and screenwriter. His 1980 movie Morning Undersea was entered into the 12th Moscow International Film Festival and won a special award. He was born in Lisbon, Portugal. His career began in 1975. António died on 3 February 2022 in Lisbon at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese movie directors Category:Portuguese movie producers Category:Portuguese screenwriters Category:People from Lisbon
title: Lauro António
